metadata.dc:author: Delgado Gallardo, S
Acosta López, W
Valenzuela Hernández, M E
Aguilar Parada, E
Fuentes Barrientos, L A
metadata.dc:description: This paper reports the association of diabetes mellitus and hyperlipidemia type III and the relation between the dose of insulin and the serum level of triglycerides and cholesterol. The coexistence of hiperglobulinemia, Bence Jones proteinuria and a positive rheumatoid factor is also reported.
metadata.dc:title: Hiperlipoproteinemia tipo III--diabétes mellitus y disglobulinemia.
[Type III hyperlipoproteinemia--diabetes mellitus and dysglobulinemia].
